backend/main.mo: Motoko actor storing per‑user conversion history with functions to add entries and return them sorted by timestamp.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a clipboard-copy enhancement to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries for various frontend source files used for reference in build planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining warm neutral light/dark palettes and global element styles.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file that loads the React app entrypoint at /src/main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component managing conversion steps, history, and share/list tabs within the UI.
frontend/src/appMetadata.ts: Exports shared constants for the app’s name and description.
frontend/src/components/BrandHeader.tsx: Header displaying the logo, title, and description using centralized metadata.
frontend/src/features/converter/Converte: Form for entering and validating a TikTok URL before starting conversion.
frontend/src/features/converter/Download: Panel handling demo conversion processing with progress, errors, and download completion callback.
frontend/src/features/converter/EmptySta: Hero section shown in idle state with app intro messaging and illustration.
frontend/src/features/converter/PresetPi: UI for selecting a conversion preset using radio-card layout with metadata badges.
Defines the ConversionPreset interface, preset list, and a helper to retrieve presets by ID.
frontend/src/features/converter/useMp4Ex: Implements a hook that simulates video conversion by generating a JPEG preview and tracks progress and errors.
frontend/src/features/converter/validato: Provides TikTok URL validation ensuring proper domain and path structure.
frontend/src/features/history/HistoryPan: Renders the conversion history table with delete actions and preset lookup.
frontend/src/features/history/historySto: Manages localStorage history retrieval, addition, deletion, and clearing.
frontend/src/features/history/historyTyp: Defines the HistoryEntry type for saved conversions.
frontend/src/features/history/useHistory: Combines local and backend history, exposes add and delete operations, and returns merged sorted entries.
frontend/src/features/market/ListingSect: Displays steps for listing the app on Caffeine App Market and supports copying submission details.
frontend/src/features/market/ShareAndLis: Wraps share utilities and listing section into a single panel.
frontend/src/features/market/ShareUtilit: Provides UI to copy the current page URL using clipboard APIs with fallback handling.
frontend/src/features/results/ResultsScr: Shows conversion success message, preview, download option, preset details, and YouTube upload instructions.
frontend/src/features/results/uploadGuid: Defines an UploadStep interface and a list of step-by-step guidance items for manually uploading converted videos to YouTube.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor instance tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Exposes a query hook to fetch a user's conversion history from the backend actor when available.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind CSS layers and CSS variables for theming in both light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/utils/clipboard.ts: Implements a safe clipboard write function with modern API usage and fallback support.
frontend/src/utils/shareLinks.ts: Generates shareable URLs for Facebook, X, LinkedIn, and email with encoded parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom theme extensions, color tokens, typography, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, features, requirements, and architectural notes for the TikTok-to-YouTube converter app.
